snippet: Manager Terry Collins acknowledged his players might have been thrown off their rhythm during a trip in which three of their games were postponed because of snow.
abstract: New York Mets manager Terry Collins acknowledges his players may have been thrown off their rhythm during series against Minnesota Twins, in which three of their games were postponed because of snow.
lead_paragraph: Manager Terry Collins acknowledged his players might have been thrown off their rhythm during a trip in which three of their games were postponed because of snow.

headline.seo: Mets Hoping Wintry Blast Doesn’t Leave Them in a Cold Spell
headline.main: Mets Hoping Frigid Trip Doesn’t Send Them Into a Cold Spell
headline.print_headline: Mets Hoping Frigid Trip Doesn’t Send Them Into a Cold Spell
